info.title: Contact Category for Sourcing Project â€“ Read
info.description: This service displays the configured contact category and the corresponding contact category description. The requested information is sent as a response. You can request information about all available contact categories or specific ones.

x-sap-shortText: Read contact categories and their description for sourcing projects using this synchronous inbound service
